title: Facebook Continues Its War on Fake News With New Measures
text: The social networking giant keeps improving the health of its platforms.

title: Facebook is taking a page out of Google's playbook to stop fake news from going viral
text: Facebook is using a copycat of Google's famous PageRank technique to filter fake news and other bad content from its News Feed.

title: Facebook is rolling out new features to crack down on content violations as misinformation spreads
text: Facebook is targeting misinformation and content violations in its new updates.

title: How Facebook might change to accommodate regulation
text: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg surprised many when he made a public appeal to Congress in the Washington Post for them to actively regulate social media content. This is a departure from what many social media companies had been saying for over a decade since the companies became prominent.

title: Facebook adds new tools for handling accounts of deceased users
text: Facebook has unveiled artificial intelligence tools and new features to prevent upsetting users after their friends or family have passed away.

title: Mewawalla on Facebook
text: Cyrus Mewawalla, GlobalData Head of investment research, talks Facebook's apology tour and regulation coming to tech

title: Facebook To $200? Probably
text: Many analysts are raising their price targets for Facebook.
